explains: n. 清醒，冷静；节制；严肃

sentences.en: The other two were in recovery, still teetering on the brink of sobriety.
sentences.cn: 另外两人正在康复中，仍然不太清醒。

sentences.en: I insist on perfect sobriety and silence.
sentences.cn: 我坚持绝对的清净和安静。

sentences.en: Their depression makes sobriety doubly difficult.
sentences.cn: 他们身患抑郁让他们的清醒更是难上加难。
